name: npm-strap
description: An npm frontend project bootstrapper, using npm itself as a build tool.

scripts.bootstrap: npm i ; mkdir build && touch build/.keep
scripts.build:css: cat source/*.css source/components/*/*.css | postcss -u cssnext -u postcss-nested -o build/style.css
scripts.build:css:prod: cat source/*.css source/components/*/*.css | postcss -u cssnext -u postcss-nested | cleancss -o build/style.css
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:html:prod && npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:js:prod
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run server' 'npm run server:fixtures' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch

author: Simone Vittori
